amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language in the bill which would require States to adopt weaker international ballast water standards as a ceiling for regulatory efforts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-267 to strike Title VII.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 237 (Roll no. 836).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Slaughter.
